description.text: Normal Attack
Deal Physical DMG to an enemy. Has a 5 hit combo.
Charged Attack
Unleash 2 rapid sword strikes after a small delay. Uses Stamina.
Plunging Attack
Drop to the ground below, dealing Physical DMG on its way, and deal AoE Physical DMG upon impact.

originalDescription.text: Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.text: Launches nearby opponents, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

originalDescription.text: Summons blooming ice to launch nearby opponents, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

description.text: Summons forth a flurry of snowstorm that moves forward continuously and slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing a total of 20 instances of Cryo DMG.
The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

originalDescription.text: Summons forth a snowstorm with flawless poise, unleasing a Frostflake Seki no To that moves forward continously.
Frostflake Seki no To
A storm of whirling icy winds that slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing Cryo DMG.
The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
Alternate Spirit
Ayaka consumes Stamina and cloaks herself in a frozen fog that moves with her.
In Senho form, she moves swiftly upon water.
When she reappears, the following effects occur:
Ayaka unleashes frigid energy to apply Cryo on nearby opponents.
Coldness condenses around Ayaka's blade, infusing her attacks with Cryo for a brief period.

description.text: For 6s after using her Elemental Skill, her Normal and Charged attacks deal 30% increased DMG.

originalDescription.text: After using Kamisato Art: Hyouka, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.

description.text: When her Elemental Burst's final explosion applies Cryo to an opponent, she restores 10 Stamina and gains 18% Cryo DMG Bonus for 10s.

originalDescription.text: When the Cryo application at the end of Kamisato Art: Senho hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects:
Restores 10 Stamina
Gains 18% Cryo DMG Bonus for 10s.

description.text: When she crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product

originalDescription.text: When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

description.text: Every 0.1s, when her Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of her Elemental Skill by 0.3s.

originalDescription.text: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

description.text: When casting Elemental Burst, unleashes 2 smaller additional snowstorms in a 90-degree arc, each dealing 20% of the original snowstorm's DMG.

originalDescription.text: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

description.text: Increases Elemental Burst's level by 3.
Increases Elemental Burst's max level by 5 (to 15).

originalDescription.text: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

description.text: Reduce DEF of opponents damaged with her Elemental Skill by 30% for 6s.

originalDescription.text: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

description.text: Increases Elemental Skill's level by 3.
Increases Elemental Skill's max level by 5 (to 15).

originalDescription.text: Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

description.text: Every 10s, Kamisato Ayaka's next Charged Attack DMG is increased by 298%, which will be cleared 0.5s after her Charged Attack hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

originalDescription.text: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.
